title: RalphStepResult
description: Result schema for Ralph mode iterations. Agent returns complete pending steps list giving full control over ordering.

status.description: Outcome: continue iterating, goal achieved, or human needed

summary.description: Summary of what was done in this iteration

completedStepIds.description: IDs of steps that were completed in this iteration

pendingSteps.description: Complete ordered list of pending steps (existing + new). First item = next to execute

id.description: Existing step ID, or null for new steps

goalCompleteSummary.description: Final summary when goal is complete (used when status is 'goal-complete')
